messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM On Jul 28, 2013 9:06 AM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev1, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com), > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > effective_go.html: make snippets look formatted. > > Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/11991043/ > > Affected files: > M doc/effective_go.html > > > Index: doc/effective_go.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/doc/effective_go.html > +++ b/doc/effective_go.html > @@ -882,7 +882,7 @@ > } > x := 0 > for ; i < len(b) && isDigit(b[i]); i++ { > - x = x*10 + int(b[i])-'0' > + x = x*10 + int(b[i]) - '0' > } > return x, i > } > @@ -1496,7 +1496,7 @@ > so it's easy to build them during initialization. >

> 
> -var timeZone = map[string] int {
> +var timeZone = map[string]int{
>      "UTC":  0*60*60,
>      "EST": -5*60*60,
>      "CST": -6*60*60,
> @@ -1523,7 +1523,7 @@
>  test it by simple indexing.
>  

>  
> -attended := map[string] bool {
> +attended := map[string]bool{
>      "Ann": true,
>      "Joe": true,
>      ...
> @@ -3437,7 +3437,7 @@
>  

>
>  
> -if pos==0 {
> +if pos == 0 {
>      re.error("'*' illegal at start of expression")
>  }
>  

>
>
> --
>

> Groups "golang-dev" group.

> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@**googlegroups.com
> .
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/**groups/opt_out
> .
>
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=258251b0b725 ***

effective_go.html: make snippets look formatted.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11991043

subject: code review 11991043: effective_go.html: make snippets look formatted.
